name: legacy-to-minimessage
description: Convert Legacy formatting to MiniMessage quickly (Or the other way, if you prefer!)

legacyToMiniMessage.formatChar.description: Primary formatting character used in legacy text (e.g., & or ยง).

legacyToMiniMessage.concise.description: Use concise MiniMessage tags like <b>, <u>, etc.

legacyToMiniMessage.supportBothChars.description: Convert both '&' and 'ยง' style codes simultaneously.

legacyToMiniMessage.removeNewlines.description: Ask to Remove all newlines and convert text into one line during conversion.

legacyToMiniMessage.colorAliases.description: Override default MiniMessage color tags. E.g., { "dark_red": "#HEX123" } Useful if you have a custom server "Gold" Color or something.

legacyToMiniMessage.autoConvertOnPaste.description: Automatically convert legacy formatting when pasting text into the editor.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
